price: ߡߐ߱ ߗߋߥߊߟߌ ߢߍߕߊ ߣߴߊ߬ ߞߐߟߕߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߟߊߓߐ߫ ߊ߬ ߡߊ߬ ߏ߬ ߟߏ߲
arabic: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yunabba-u al-insānu yawma-idhin bimā qaddama wa-akhara
